an3.5:1.3: Ayoniso pañhaṁ kattā hoti, ayoniso pañhaṁ vissajjetā hoti, parassa kho pana yoniso pañhaṁ vissajjitaṁ parimaṇḍalehi padabyañjanehi siliṭṭhehi upagatehi nābbhanumoditā hoti.
an3.5:1.4: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, tīhi dhammehi samannāgato bālo veditabbo.
an3.5:2.1: Tīhi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato paṇḍito veditabbo.
an3.5:2.3: Yoniso pañhaṁ kattā hoti, yoniso pañhaṁ vissajjetā hoti, parassa kho pana yoniso pañhaṁ vissajjitaṁ parimaṇḍalehi padabyañjanehi siliṭṭhehi upagatehi abbhanumoditā hoti.
an3.5:2.4: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, tīhi dhammehi samannāgato paṇḍito veditabbo.
